RuleDetails.Rules:
FOR ONE WAY BUDGET INSTANT PURCHASE FARES
 
  TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12
  MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
 
  OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED.
  TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 30 MINUTES AFTER
  RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR AT LEAST 14 DAYS BEFORE
  DEPARTURE.

FOR ONE WAY BUDGET INSTANT PURCHASE FARES
 
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY J2 FLIGHT.

FOR ONE WAY BUDGET INSTANT PURCHASE FARES
 
  IN THE EVENT OF CHANGES TO TICKETED FLIGHTS
   ANYTIME WITHIN TKT VALIDITY
     CHANGES EXCEPT RBD NOT PERMITTED TO THE FARE COMPONENT-
     CHARGE SUM OF FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS.

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
 
  REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY 16

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
 
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON J2 .
         NOTE -
          SALES PERMITTED ON TICKET STOCK VALIDATED OR
          PLATED J2/771 ONLY.

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
 
  CHANGES
 
    CHANGES NOT PERMITTED IN CASE OF CANCEL/REFUND/REISSUE/
     REVALIDATION.
         NOTE -
          UPGRADE IS PERMITTED TO BUSINESS CLASS FARES.
          REROUTING IS NOT PERMITTED.
          UNUSED TAXES AND FEES ARE NOT REFUNDABLE.

FOR ONE WAY BUDGET INSTANT PURCHASE FARES
ONE WAY BUDGET INSTANT PURCHASE FARES
 APPLICATION
   AREA
     THESE FARES APPLY
     BETWEEN EUROPE/MIDDLE EAST.
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
   TICKETS ARE VALID FOR TRANSPORTATION ONLY IN
   STRICT SEQUENCE OF FLIGHT COUPONS.
   INCONSEQUENTLY USED FLIGHT COUPONS MAKE AIR
   TICKET INVALID FOR FURTHER TRANSPORTATION
 OTHER CONDITIONS
   1.FOR ADM POLICY PLEASE VISIT WWW.AZAL.AZ
   2.FREE BAGGAGE IS NOT ALLOWED

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
 
  VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 28MAR 16.
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

FOR PRTAJ TYPE FARES
   SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
   END-ON-END PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL
   FARE COMPONENTS. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA POINT OF COMBINATION.
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  ROUND TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH J2
    FARES
    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY PRTAJ/PRT7D/PRT3D FARE FOR
     CARRIER J2 IN ANY RULE IN THIS TARIFF.

FOR RESERVATIONS ON/AFTER 01OCT 14/FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER
  01OCT 14
    TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 6
    MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
         NOTE -
          OPEN RETURN IS PERMITTED ONLY WITH COMBINATION OF
          T AND Y CLASSES/FIRST FLIGHT SEQMENT T IS REQUIRED
          DURING OPEN DATE Q FUEL SURCHARGE IS REQUIRED TO
          BE APPLIED IN ACCORDANCE WITH 12 CATEGORY.
          DURING OPEN DATE YQ 3 EUR  PER SEGMENT SURCHARGE
          IS REQUIRED TO BE APPLIED IN ACCORDANCE WITH J2
          RULES.
          VOID IS PERMITTED WITHIN 3 HOURS AFTER TICKET
          ISSUE NOT LESS 3 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
          IN CASE OF NO-SHOW VOID IS NOT PERMITTED.
          WAITLIST IS NOT PERMITTED AT TIME OF TICKETING.

THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY J2 FLIGHT.
  AND
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        J2 FLIGHTS 4105 THROUGH 4106 OPERATED BY J2.

IN THE EVENT OF CHANGES TO TICKETED FLIGHTS
   BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - APPLIES WITHIN TKT VALIDITY
    CERTAIN DOMESTIC REISSUE PROVISIONS MAY BE OVERRIDDEN BY
    THOSE OF J2  INTERNATIONAL FARES
     CHARGE 50 PERCENT OR SUM OF FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE
     COMPONENTS - INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY AND
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT TODAY
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. CHANGE IS BEFORE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       3. J2  FARES ARE USED
       4. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       5. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM REISSUE DATE TO DEPARTURE
       OF FARE COMPONENT
   WHEN CHANGE RESULTS IN LOWER FARE IGNORE RESIDUAL THEN
   ADD-COLLECT
   ENDORSEMENT BOX- HIGHER NON-REF AMT AND NEW ENDORSEMENTS.
  OR -
   BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - APPLIES WITHIN TKT VALIDITY
    CERTAIN DOMESTIC REISSUE PROVISIONS MAY BE OVERRIDDEN BY
    THOSE OF J2  INTERNATIONAL FARES
     CHARGE 75 PERCENT OR SUM OF FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE
     COMPONENTS - INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY AND
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT TODAY
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. CHANGE IS AFTER ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       3. J2  FARES ARE USED
       4. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       5. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM REISSUE DATE TO DEPARTURE
       OF FARE COMPONENT
   WHEN CHANGE RESULTS IN LOWER FARE IGNORE RESIDUAL THEN
   ADD-COLLECT
   ENDORSEMENT BOX- HIGHER NON-REF AMT AND NEW ENDORSEMENTS.
  OR -
   AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - APPLIES WITHIN TKT VALIDITY
    CERTAIN DOMESTIC REISSUE PROVISIONS MAY BE OVERRIDDEN BY
    THOSE OF J2  INTERNATIONAL FARES
     CHARGE 50 PERCENT OR SUM OF FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE
     COMPONENTS - INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY AND
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT WHEN TKT WAS ISSUED
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. FULLY FLOWN FARE NOT REPRICED TO FURTHER POINT
       3. CHANGE IS BEFORE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       4. J2  FARES ARE USED
       5. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       6. ALL RULE AND BOOKING CODE PROVISIONS ARE MET
       7. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM ORIGINAL TKT DATE TO
       DEPARTURE OF FARE COMPONENT
      OR -
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT TODAY
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. FULLY FLOWN FARE NOT REPRICED TO FURTHER POINT
       3. CHANGE IS BEFORE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       4. J2  FARES ARE USED
       5. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       6. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM REISSUE DATE TO DEPARTURE
       OF FARE COMPONENT
   WHEN CHANGE RESULTS IN LOWER FARE IGNORE RESIDUAL THEN
   ADD-COLLECT
   ENDORSEMENT BOX- HIGHER NON-REF AMT AND NEW ENDORSEMENTS.
  OR -
   AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY - APPLIES WITHIN TKT VALIDITY
    CERTAIN DOMESTIC REISSUE PROVISIONS MAY BE OVERRIDDEN BY
    THOSE OF J2  INTERNATIONAL FARES
     CHARGE 75 PERCENT OR SUM OF FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE
     COMPONENTS - INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY AND
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT WHEN TKT WAS ISSUED
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. FULLY FLOWN FARE NOT REPRICED TO FURTHER POINT
       3. CHANGE IS AFTER ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       4. J2  FARES ARE USED
       5. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       6. ALL RULE AND BOOKING CODE PROVISIONS ARE MET
       7. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM ORIGINAL TKT DATE TO
       DEPARTURE OF FARE COMPONENT
      OR -
      REPRICE USING FARES IN EFFECT TODAY
       PROVIDED ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE MET-
       1. WHEN NO INTL COUPONS REMAIN - ALL NEW TRAVEL MUST
       BE DOMESTIC
       2. FULLY FLOWN FARE NOT REPRICED TO FURTHER POINT
       3. CHANGE IS AFTER ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT
       4. J2  FARES ARE USED
       5. NEW TKT HAS EQUAL OR HIGHER VALUE THAN PREVIOUS
       TKT
       6. ADV RES IS MEASURED FROM REISSUE DATE TO DEPARTURE
       OF FARE COMPONENT
   WHEN CHANGE RESULTS IN LOWER FARE IGNORE RESIDUAL THEN
   ADD-COLLECT
   ENDORSEMENT BOX- HIGHER NON-REF AMT AND NEW ENDORSEMENTS.
REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY 16

CHANGES
 
    BEFORE DEPARTURE
      CHARGE 50 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
 
    AFTER DEPARTURE
      CHARGE 75 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
         NOTE -
          CHANGES-
          1.CHANGE/REFUND OF PARTLY USED TICKET MUST BE
          APPLIED FOR THE UNUSED ACTUAL SEGMENT ONLY.
          2.IN CASE OF COMBINED FARE PENALITY FOR
          REBOOKING /REVALIDATION CHARGES IN ACCORDANCE
          WITH AN ACTUAL SEGMENT.
          3.REBOOKING/REVALIDATION WITH UPGRADE PERMITTED
          IN ACCORDANCE WITH  A NEW FARE CLASS RULES.
          4.UPGRADE TO HIGHER RBD PERMITTED IN DIFFERENCE
          OF FARES.
          5.REROUTING IS PERMITTED - WHEN ITINERARY CHANGE
          RESULTS IN HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE AND EUR 50/
          USD 70/GBP 40/260 AED SHOULD BE COLLECTED PER
          SEGMENT.
          6.WHEN ITINERARY CHANGE RESULTS IN LOWER FARE
          NO REFUND WILL BE MADE.
          7.CHANGES/REFUND OF TICKET NOT DEPEND FROM THE
          CANCELLATION TIME OF SECTOR ITINERARY OR ENTIRE
          PNR.
          --ALL TAX/FEE/CHARGE OF NEW ITINERARY MUST BE
          COLLECTED.
 
  CANCELLATIONS
 
    BEFORE DEPARTURE
      CHARGE 50 PERCENT FOR REFUND.
 
    AFTER DEPARTURE
      TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF REFUND.
         NOTE -
          REFUND WITH UPGRADE-
          -REFUND IN DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND
          THE ACTUAL FARE
          -THE REMAINING AMOUNT WILL BE REFUNDED IN
          ACCORDANCE WITH THE RULES OF THE ORIGINAL TICKET.
          --------------------------------------------------
          -FOR THE INITIAL FLIGHT WHERE T/L/M FARE CLASSES
          IS COMBINED WITH W/Y/C CONDITIONS OF PARTLY USED
          TICKET FOR THE RETURN ITINERARY EUR 50 MUST BE
          APPLIED.
          -IN CASE OF DOWNGRADE DIFFERENCE OF FARES NON
          REFUNADBALE.
          NO SHOW-LESS THAN 40 MINUTES BEFORE THE
          COMMENCEMENT OF JOURNEY.
          -UNUSED TAXES AND FEES ARE REFUNDABLE.

ECONOMY RESTRICTED
 APPLICATION
   AREA
     THESE FARES APPLY
     BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST.
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
   TICKETS ARE VALID FOR TRANSPORTATION ONLY IN
   STRICT SEQUENCE OF FLIGHT COUPONS.
   INCONSEQUENTLY USED FLIGHT COUPONS MAKE AIR
   TICKET INVALID FOR FURTHER TRANSPORTATION
 OTHER CONDITIONS
   1.FOR ADM POLICY PLEASE VISIT WWW.AZAL.AZ
   2.FREE BAGGAGE IS NOT ALLOWED

INFANT -2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT
  OR - INFANT -2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT
  OR - ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT.
         NOTE -
          SSR/CHD OR SSR/INF MUST BE ADDED IN PNR
          CARRIAGE OF UNACOMPANIED CHILD AT THE AGE OF 05-
          12 YEARS SHALL BE CHARGED WITH 25 PERCENT OF CHD
          DISCOUNT OF THE FARE OF AN ADULT PASSENGER FROM
          ANY AVAILABLE CLASS.
          CARRIAGE OF UNACOMPANIED CHILD AT THE AGE OF 12-
          14 YEARS ON INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS OF THE AIRLINE
          CAN BE CHARGED AT THE FARE OF ADULT PASSENGER IN
          ANY AVAILABLE CLASS.
          AIRLINE REZERVES THE RIGHT TO AUDIT SUPPORTING
          DOCUMENTATION PROVING ACCURACY OF DISCOUNT
          APPLICATION.PENALTY FOR INAPPROPRIATE APPLICATION
          OF THE DISCOUNT BY THE ISSUING AGENT EQUALS 5000
          EUR

DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
   FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH ANY
   FARE FOR ANY CARRIER IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF TO FORM ROUND
   TRIPS.
   END-ON-END PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL
   FARE COMPONENTS. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA POINT OF COMBINATION.
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  OPEN JAWS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH J2
    FARES IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF.
    -TO FORM SINGLE OPEN JAWS.
     THE MILEAGE FOR AN INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT IS EQUAL
     TO OR LESS THAN THE MILEAGE FOR THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE
     COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN
     SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY.
     OPEN JAWS NOTE -
       IN CASE OF COMBINATION THE MOST RESTRICTIVE
       CONDITIONS APPLY.

          VOID IS PERMITTED WITHIN 3 HOURS AFTER TICKET

          IN CASE OF NO-SHOW VOID IS NOT PERMITTED.
          WAITLIST IS NOT PERMITTED AT TIME OF TICKETING.

  OPEN JAWS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH J2
    FARES IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF.
    -TO FORM SINGLE OPEN JAWS.
     THE MILEAGE FOR AN INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT IS EQUAL
     TO OR LESS THAN THE MILEAGE FOR THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE
     COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN
     SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY.
     OPEN JAWS NOTE -
       IN CASE OF COMBINATION THE MOST RESTRICTIVE
       CONDITIONS APPLY.

  MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.
